SELECT RN, NOTI_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_DATE, NOTI_HIT_COUNT, NOTI_FILE_CHECK FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT N.NOTI_NO ,N.MEMBER_NO ,M.MEMBER_NICK ,N.NOTI_TITLE ,N.NOTI_CONTENT ,N.NOTI_DATE ,N.NOTI_HIT_COUNT ,N.NOTI_FILE_CHECK
FROM NOTICE N INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
AND N.NOTI_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND N.NOTI_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE N.NOTI_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR N.NOTI_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
)A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE N INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
AND N.NOTI_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND N.NOTI_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE N.NOTI_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR N.NOTI_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT FILE_NO ,ORG_FILE_NAME ,ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE ,DEL_GB FROM BFILE WHERE NOTI_NO = #{noti_no} AND DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY FILE_NO ASC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_FILE_CHECK ,M.MEMBER_NICK ,C.BCOMMENT_NO ,C.BCOMMENT_CONTENT ,C.BCOMMENT_DATE ,C.BCOMMENT_REPORT_COUNT ,C.BCOMMENT_LIKE_COUNT ,C.REF_STEP ,C.REF_LEVEL
FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN BCOMMENT C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
WHERE C.BCOMMENT_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE C.BCOMMENT_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY B.BOARD_DATE DESC
ORDER BY C.BCOMMENT_DATE DESC
ORDER BY C.BCOMMENT_REPORT_COUNT DESC
